title: Brain Health and Nutrition | Heights
description: We provide the daily nutrients, knowledge and network you need to elevate your cognitive potential and brain health. Learn more!
cleaned_text: Omega 3 EPA contributes to normal heart health and the maintenance of normal blood pressure. Folate (B9), iron, and vitamins A, C, D, B6 and B12 support immune function—maintaining your natural defences. Zinc and biotin (B7) maintain hair and skin—keeping them healthy and strong. Vitamin D is essential in the maintenance of strong, healthy bones and teeth. Thiamin (B1) and riboflavin (B2) play a role in nerve function and vitamin D maintains muscle function—so you can keep moving forward.
